hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MEMORY_IMAGE_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Pat of the raw memory image.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CASE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the case - used to build output paths.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTPUT_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the evidence processing output

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REKALL_ARGS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify extra arguments to pass to volatility, including image file (-f file), profile (--profile file.json).

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [[ ! -d $OUTPUT_LOCATION ]]; then mkdir $OUTPUT_LOCATION || true; fi ## http://www.rekall-forensic.com/docs/Manual/Plugins/Linux/ ## 1 rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} pslist >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/pslist_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} pstree >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/pstree_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} psaux >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/psaux_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} psxview >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/psxview_output ## 2 rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} lsof >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/lsof_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} handles >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/handles_output ## 3 (depending on profile...) rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} arp >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/arp_output; rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} ifconfig >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/ifconfig_output; rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} check_afinfo >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/check_afinfo_output; ## 4 ## Dumping commands seems to require a pid... #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} malfind --dump-dir ${OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/malfind_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} ldrmodules -v > ${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/ldrmodules_output ## other rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} dmesg >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/dmesg_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} cpuinfo >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/cpuinfo_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} hostname >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/hostname_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} banner >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/banner_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} bash >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/bash_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} check_creds >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/check_creds_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} check_idt >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/check_idt_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} check_modules >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/check_modules_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} check_syscall >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/check_syscall_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} check_ttys >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/check_ttys_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} iomem >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/iomem_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} lsmod >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/lsmod_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} maps >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/maps_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} mount >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mount_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} notifier_chains >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/notifier_chains_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} pkt_queues --dump-dir ${REKALL_OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/pkt_queues_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} vaddump >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/vaddump_output
